name: Butterfly's Keep
description:
You awake in the ruins of a genetic laboratory. You know who you are. You know you were created with a purpose. However, there are many things you do not know, such as the dangers that lurk right outside your door. The city has been infested by mutated arthropods, who are creating nests to multiple their armies by the hundreds. Despite this, you're already fully capable of countering this threat, whether you want to or not. 

As you partake in missions throughout North Star City, you will gain more experience physically, mentally, and emotionally. The various creatures will push your abilities to the limit, but you won't be alone. You'll have opportunities to bond with your teammates, possibly even developing a romantic relationship if you desire. You might also discover a dark secret if you search beyond your bounds. Yet is it right for you to act outside of what you were created for? You mostly appear and act human, but should you be treated as one? Your mother is science and your father is code, therefore your existence is artificial.

What is the scientific definition of a soul?

-------------------------------

Features:

  • A linear, turn-based RPG with dynamic QTEs to maximize skills.
  • 5 Good Endings + 4 Bad Endings + 1 True Ending = 10 Possibilities to explore.
  • Spiders, caterpillars, scorpions, and other creepy crawlies.
  • A free FAQ to answer any questions you might have.
  • A New Game+ that provides access to a secret boss, the true ending, and much more.

Warning: This game contains swearing, death, and suggestive themes.
